PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03262019-04-12TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (Emergency Response Assistance Plan)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (EMERGENCY RESPONSE ASSISTANCE PLAN) in order to address the recommendations of the EMERGENCY RESPONSE TASK FORCE to improve the EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE RESPONSE PLAN PROGRAM and enhance public safety in the event of an incident during the transportation of dangerous goods.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0101 Publication Date: 2019-05-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (Emergency Response Assistance Plan)
precis: Regulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (EMERGENCY RESPONSE ASSISTANCE PLAN) in order to address the recommendations of the EMERGENCY RESPONSE TASK FORCE to improve the EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE RESPONSE PLAN PROGRAM and enhance public safety in the event of an incident during the transportation of dangerous goods.
